body.p:
Ventilation clearances (minimum):
6" both sides, OR
6" rear plus one side

PDUs with the Multi-Output PDU Option must either have 36" service clearance in the rear or 36" on both sides for reconfiguring transformer secondary output voltages or the PDU must be moved forward when reconfiguring the transformer.
Follow the National Electrical Code (NEC) and local electrical codes for clearance requirements in addition to these clearances.
